raw_comment:
1. What do I notice. The women’s Basketball team has more players than the national football team.
2. What do I wonder? I wonder why does the woman’s BasketBall team have more players than the National Football team.
3. It really doesn’t have an impact on me but it might affect some people in my city.
4. Comparing sports. Sports are gooooood.
ace_sentences: I notice that the women's basketball team has more players than the national football team.
I wonder why the women's basketball team has more players than the national football team.
This fact does not have an impact on me.
This fact might affect some people in my city.
